Uses of Class
Model.Graph

Packages that use Graph 
Package Description
Model  

  • Uses of Graph in Model

    Methods in Model that return Graph 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Graph GamePlay.getGraphObj()  
    static Graph Graph.getInstance()
    Singleton implementation of Database class
    Methods in Model with parameters of type Graph 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean Country.addArmiesToCountry​(java.lang.String countryName, java.lang.Integer numberOfArmies, Graph gameGraph)
    This method adds additional army units to a country object in gameGraph
    static boolean Country.addCountry​(java.lang.String newCountry, java.lang.String inContinent, Graph gameGraph)
    Add a new country object to gameGraph adjacency list
    static boolean Country.addNeighbour​(java.lang.String countryWithNewNeighbour, java.lang.String neighbour, Graph gameGraph)
    This adds new neighhbor country number in ArrayList of neighbors in country.adjlist.neighbours and also adds the country's number in new neighbor's Arraylist of neighbors
    static boolean Country.allCountriesPopulated​(Graph gameGraph)
    checks if all the countries has an owner
    static boolean Country.assignOwner​(java.lang.String ownerName, java.lang.String countryName, Graph g)
    this assign an owner to a country without owner
    static boolean Country.changeOwner​(java.lang.String newOwnerName, java.lang.String countryName, Graph g)
    this updates the owner name for a country in Database.adjlist
    static boolean Country.checkExistenceOfCountry​(java.lang.String countryToCheck, Graph gameGraph)
    checks the existence of the country in Database.adjlist
    static boolean Continent.continentBelongToPlayer​(Player playerName, java.lang.String continentName, Graph gameGraph)  
    static boolean Country.fortify​(java.lang.String fromCname, java.lang.String toCountryName, java.lang.Integer numberOfArmies, Graph gameGraph)
    This allows a player to move any number of armies from his owned country to any of his owned neighbor country, leaving behind atleast 1 army unit.
    static Country Country.getCountryByName​(java.lang.String countryName, Graph gameGraph)
    this returns the instance where the country is saved in Database.adjlist
    static Country Country.getCountryByNumber​(java.lang.Integer countryNumber, Graph gameGraph)
    this returns the instance where the country is saved in Database.adjlist
    static java.util.ArrayList<Country> Continent.getCountryList​(Continent continent, Graph gameGraph)
    This create and returns list of countries in a continent
    static java.util.ArrayList<Country> Player.getOwnedCountryList​(java.lang.String playerName, Graph gameGraph)
    this provides the list of countries owned by a particular player
    boolean Mapx.loadMap​(java.lang.String mapFile, Graph gameGraph)
    creates gameGraph of the map file provided gameGraph returned by this method is the most important variable in the whole game gameGraph is a Graph that holds an ArrayList of countries
    static boolean Country.removeArmiesFromCountry​(java.lang.String countryName, java.lang.Integer numberOfArmies, Graph gameGraph)
    This method removes army units from a country object in the gameGraph
    static boolean Continent.removeContinent​(java.lang.String continentToRemove, Graph gameGraph)
    if the entered continent exists, it removes all the countries under that continent and after that removes that continent from the Database.continentList
    static boolean Country.removeCountry​(java.lang.String NameOfCountryToRemove, Graph gameGraph)
    This method removes a country from the gameGraph list, and makes the necessary changes to the list
    static boolean Country.removeNeighbour​(java.lang.String firstCountryName, java.lang.String secondCountryName, Graph gameGraph)
    This method removes a neighbour from a country that exists in the gameGraph variable
    boolean Mapx.saveMap​(Graph gameGraph, java.lang.String mp)
    This method operates on the gameGraph variable and converts it to map file.
    static void Continent.updateContinitsOwner​(Graph gameGraph)
    This updates the owner of the continent
    static void Country.updatePlayerListAndDeclareWinner​(Graph g)
    updates the player list, remove the player if 0 country is owned by that player or declares winner if every country in Database.adjlist is owned by a single player
    static boolean Mapx.validateMap​(Graph gameGraph)
    This method checks the gameGraph for graph connectivity
